strategy: Squat armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Wotan Stronghold.

formations.name: Warrior Retinue
formations.units: One Squat Chieftain in a Hearthguard unit, seven Squat Warriors
extraUnits: Add up to four Squat Warriors: 15 points each
Replace up to two Squat Warriors with Hearthguards: 35 points each

sections.name: Wotan Stronghold Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three Stronghold Support Formations for each Stronghold Core Formation.

formations.name: Berserkers
extraUnits: Must take one of the following options
Deploy the formation inside a Hellbore: Free
Add three Rhinos to the formation: 25 points
Add three Termites to the formation: 50 points

formations.name: Bikers
extraUnits: Replace up to three Squat Bikers with Squat Trikes: Free

formations.name: Light Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Replace five Thudd Guns with six Mole Mortars or seven Rapiers: Free

formations.name: Vultarax Maniple
formations.units: One Steel Hawk Gyrokopter, five Vultarax Robots

formations.name: Conqueror Maniple
formations.units: One Squat Tech-Priest, five Conqueror Robots

formations.name: Thunderfire Battery
formations.units: Three Squat Thunderfires, three Gun Emplacements

sections.name: Wotan Stronghold War Engines and Flyers
sections.description: Up to forty percent of the points available may be spent on Wotan Stronghold War Engines and Flyers

formations.name: Land Train
formations.units: One Squat Land Train and between two and four Battle Cars
extraUnits: Siege Mortar Battle Car: 75 points each
Berserker Battle Car and one unit of Squat Berserkers: 75 points each

upgrades.title: Wotan Stronghold Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

options.description: Replace the Squat Chieftain with a Supreme Chieftain

items.name: Transport
items.description: Choose one of the following options:

options.description: Add enough Rhinos and/or Land Raiders to transport the entire formation with no space left over
points: 50 points for each Land Raider (Thunderers only)

options.description: The entire formation may be deployed in Termites. The formation may only enter the battlefield by Tunneling.
